## Matrix4x4.getFarPlaneHeight() method

Get height of the far clip plane.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getFarPlaneHeight(): number;
```
**Returns:**

number

Height of the far clip plane

## Remarks

This method assumes that this is a projection matrix (perspective or orthogonal).
